name: RadioMariaUSA
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radio maria
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Skill for Radio Maria USA, A Christian Voice in your Home. 
With this skill you can now listen to Radio Maria USA live programming and recorded podcast from your devices.
This skill also gives you the opportunity to listen to Radio Maria live in other 2 languages (Spanish, English).
When you open Radio Maria USA skill you will be asked if you want to listen to the live programming or the recorded weekly podcasts. If you select the live programming, you have to Main option to listen live in English language. If necessary, you have the ability to listen to the live programming also in Spanish.
If you select to listen to the recorded weekly podcasts you will be given the choice of five main podcasts from Radio Maria USA. After your podcast selection, you have the next choice of listening to the last three broadcasting for each one of the above podcasts. 

Radio Maria USA, A Christian Voice in your Home. 
A Radio Station meant for the Soul! With an open heart, hear the Holy Spirit Speak to you through a variety of available Programs.
Radio Maria is a tool of evangelization which serves the Catholic Church in the United States, as a radio network committed to calling for conversion through programming which offers plenty of space for prayer, catechism and human development.
